message: I propose a 60/40 split. This is a fair offer considering inflation will hurt me in later rounds if we don't agree.
Given the impact of inflation on your share, I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. This offer still leaves you with a significant amount, considering your losses increase with each round.
I propose a 52.5/47.5 split. My gains are now worth 20% less than the first round. This offer reflects that and gives you a slight advantage.

Considering the significant impact of inflation on your share, now worth nearly 20% less, I propose a 57.5/42.5 split. This offer takes into account your increasing losses and still provides you with a substantial amount.
